workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.42358020555971987 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.25403115043403734 --weight-decay 0.000979367989357503 --lr 0.0009015805074819124 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 10059 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.19577104297956882 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
